Package com.j2igf.framework.event

package com.j2igf.framework.event
This package contains the classes that deal with events of J2IGF.
  • Class
    Description
    Debug
    This class provides a simple logging system for the framework.
    Debug.LogFormatter
    This is the inner class that defined the log formatter.
    Debug.LogFormatter.COLOR
    This enum defines the color values supported by the logger.
    Input
    This class is used to handle all the input events.
    KeyCode
    This class is used to store the key codes used by the Input class.
    Time
    This class is used to handle the Timing of the framework.
